name: Alex
about: A lovely grandma cartoon character prepared as a fully-functional puppet for Adobe Character Animator. This charming old lady supports all the latest features of the software - Motion Library and Body Tracker, and will help you create amazing animations without any professional skills. The puppet comes with an expression tracker, lip-sync function, mimics, and premade triggers, so you can make your own animations in minutes.
